alert.note: Alert for East Polk; Mahnomen; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; South Beltrami (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 6:54PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Polk, central Beltrami, northeastern Mahnomen and northern Clearwater Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 654 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lengby, or 36 miles west of Bemidji, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lengby around 655 PM CDT. Olga around 705 PM CDT. Weme around 710 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Clearbrook, Gonvick and Berner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Polk; Mahnomen; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; South Beltrami
